Experience Charleston's Iconic Luxury Hotel

Welcome to Wentworth Mansion®

Step back in time and discover true Southern hospitality at Wentworth Mansion®. Like a cherished family legacy, the Mansion welcomes each guest not merely as a visitor but as an integral part of its enduring story and timeless magic.

YOUR CHARLESTON HOME AWAITS

Why Guests Fall in Love With Wentworth Mansion

A Dream Address

Nestled in the heart of Charleston’s historic district, Wentworth Mansion is just minutes from the city’s most iconic landmarks, shops, and culinary destinations.
Learn More 
Luxury Spa Onsite

The Woodhouse Spa at Wentworth is perfect for solo relaxation or a shared escape. Our curated menu includes couples packages and signature services tailored to your needs.
Learn More 
Exclusive Experiences

Elevate your stay in unforgettable ways—set sail on a private boat tour, explore the world of wine, ride through town in a vintage Model A Ford, and master seasonal cocktails.
LEARN MORE 
Explore Exclusive

Curated Packages

Enhance your stay with an exclusive package pairing luxurious accommodations with unforgettable experiences—all wrapped in the warmth of Southern hospitality.
Explore 
An Elevated Culinary Experience

Circa 1886 Restaurant

Located in the original carriage house of the historic Wentworth Mansion in downtown Charleston, Circa 1886 has long reigned as one of Charleston’s finest restaurants – a romantic backdrop for birthday celebrations, a quiet setting to discuss business or entertain friends, a one-of-a-kind venue for rehearsal dinners and bridal events.

“Great Experience”

I took my wife for her 70th Birthday, our stay was unforgettable and unbelievable! The Wentworth Mansion thought of every tiny Detail. A lot of Bang for your buck. And there are not enough words to describe the level of service. They had a bottle of champagne in the room when we arrived, wishing my wife Happy Birthday. So thoughtful. Watson was extremely efficient. We plan on going back, the next time we are in the Charleston area.

BlufftonLocal1 | 4/13/25

"Continued Excellence"

From check-in to checkout, the experience is superlative with the historic facility being spotless, the staff happily going above and beyond and our room was fantastic. We have been to the Wentworth several times with different levels of room and all are marvelous. As highlighted by others the breakfast at the adjacent Circa 1886 is phenomenal and DO yourself a favor and visit Circa 1886 for dinner… you will not be disappointed. A glorious lodging experience.

Conchobar | 4/5/25

"Magical"

Brian and Mark's service was the best we have ever experienced—unbelievable. We felt like we were a guest in someone’s home. Everything was perfect. Every detail in the rooms was perfect, beautiful, and so big. The property felt extremely safe. It was walkable to most everywhere. The wine selection in the afternoons was wonderful. The concierge was better than anywhere we have ever been—it tops Paris, which was wonderful. Hotel highlights: luxury, great view, romantic, quiet.

Debbie R. | 3/5/25
